website_summaries.verdict: Smaller bars made for tiny hands and mini appetites. Makes a great healthy snack option for kids.
pros: Made to taste just like the snack kids love, the bar includes whole food ingredients like the regular RXBARS
Provides 7 grams of protein for little tummies
Tastes good enough to satisfy even picky eaters
Some adults prefer these smaller bars, as well

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest flavor
customer_reviews.text: I guess if you've never tasted PB&J together, you'll be okay with this. I'm not talking about on bread, I'm talking about mixing both on a spoon like most of us cool kids have. They are somewhat hard and have an odd taste. I don't know what kid would enjoy these. Maybe if they've never tasted PB&J before or are just very hungry and have no other options?
customer_reviews.author: Jill P.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, decent macros
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult, but these are a great size for a snack when i'm craving something sweet and chewy. Tastes good enough for my tastebuds to consider it a treat, and keeps me satisfied until my next meal (i think it's the combo of carbs, fat, protein and fiber).
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and very healthy product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great healthy alternative for kids and adults. Made with egg whites, nuts and dates. Zero added sugars.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great portion size
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, fairly healthy and smaller kids portion is awesome. No more sticky half-eaten bars in my pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bars ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 23 year old but I keep purchasing these kids bars because they are just so great. The flavor is delicious and I much prefer this size as opposed to the regular/adult ones. They are the perfect snack! Love the clean ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lee

customer_reviews.title: PBJ all day
customer_reviews.text: Taste like a kids sandwich. Nice quick snack for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SPLCutty

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars but holy moly are they expensive. My kid loves the flavor but the price is a bit prohibitive
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Goldstone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love RX bars but they’re way too big. The kids size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but box was a mess and I was very disappointed in the company for sending
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived a complete mess! Look at photo, box was completely messed up
customer_reviews.author: Meridith

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I like this flavor as compared to some others by this brand. Also like the kids bars bc they are lower calorie and a good snack option, but wish they were a little cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snacks
customer_reviews.text: Love these bite size. Enough to hold you over and a health option
customer_reviews.author: Dayna R Cloidt

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients and Toddler approved!
customer_reviews.text: Toddler eats them and they aren’t full of sugar or artificial ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B

customer_reviews.title: Right ingredients wrong flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean ingredients and idea of a kid friendly “good for them” protein snack. I could not get anyone to finish it. The flavors of peanut butter and jelly taste off. It has a standard protein bar texture but, the jelly is overly sticky and sticks to your teeth. It’s just an odd mouth experience. So the kids in my world (ages 5-14) struggled with taste and texture. They have all had Cliff and Kind bars. Maybe you could have better luck with a younger child but, it’s not safe for babies. Note the portion size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, ok taste
customer_reviews.text: I really like the "clean and simple" approach to these snack bars. I've tried other flavors, but this is the first "kids" flavor that I've tried. These aren't sweet at all, which is great if you are looking to limit your kids' sugar intake. While I don't mind the taste, my kids are not fans at all. As other reviewers have mentioned, the texture is a bit weird. They are a little slimy- especially if you are holding them in your hand for any length of time. This could be problematic for young children, I would imagine. Great simple ingredients concept, mild flavor, but I'd just rate these bars as "ok."
customer_reviews.author: Krisilou

customer_reviews.title: Neither the flavor nor the texture are appealing, but I appreciate the limited ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This protein bar brought consensus to the group of adults and kids who tried them: They're not good. I applaud the goal of producing a snack bar that is healthy, with limited ingredients. I especially appreciate no added sugar and no soy. It's difficult to find protein/energy bars without soy. However, the texture is unpleasant - I'm not even sure how to describe it. And the flavor hovers right in that spot between "yuck" and "well, I've had worse." I didn't really taste much peanut butter; the overwhelming flavor was "tangy fruity," contributed, I assume, by the strawberry. This isn't something I would buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie T.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for myself. I like to keep low sugar snacks on hand and these were the perfect size to keep in my purse. I've tried other types of RX bars and had mixed results. Sometimes they don't taste great. I was really surprised by how much this really tastes like peanut butter and jelly. It's great as a mid morning or mid afternoon pick me up. If you're trying to feed your kids healthier with whole foods, this is a wonderful pantry item. The bars themselves are quite dense being made mostly of dates and nuts and there is a slightly oily consistency. It doesn't look as appealing as it tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdy

customer_reviews.title: Nice. A good food product.
customer_reviews.text: These are a decent food product. I like the taste, and my daughter (age 5) does too. I wouldn't exactly call it PB&J flavor, but it's not too far off I guess. Impressed that there are so few ingredients. As foods go, it's a decent one. They're a bit chewy, a bit greasy, a bit sticky to chew, but tasty. Not huge. They're targeted to kids, so I guess that's okay. The expiration date on mine is about 9 months out, I imagine they'll last fine for a while. If I could actually have them around that long. They'll be gone soon. Between my daughter and I, a box won't last super long.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Walker

customer_reviews.title: Can't Get Past the Flavor and Texture
customer_reviews.text: Me,, my husband and my granddaughter tried these bars. We've tried other flavors and thought the PB&J would taste a bit better. And although I can appreciate simplicity, I just couldn't get past the taste and texture. My husband who eats anything says they're just okay and my granddaughter says she would probably only eat them if she needed something that tasted sweet and there was nothing else in the house. I had high hopes as these were referred to us by a family with small children. They said their children loved them. We just can't get into them regardless of the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ymjauthor

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack For Kids And/Or Adults
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious--and only 130 calories. I love that there are limited ingredients--egg whites, strawberries, peanuts, dates. The bars include nothing artificial. The flavor is described as peanut butter and jelly, but like many of these types of bars, the flavor description is more of a suggestion than anything. It tastes somewhat fruity, though the peanut flavor is more subtle. This is an excellent snack for kids or adults. I like to eat them in the morning before my main meal.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Love the Nutrition, Not so much the Texture
customer_reviews.text: Well, we love the attempt at good, pure, and simple ingredients. These are definitely that, they are also definitely OK to eat, but no one in the family seems overwhelmed by them. They are peanut buttery but they are also a little...not quite slimy...but not quite unslimy. We found the texture a little off putting but the flavor was fine. These definitely do not elicit any cravings in any of us, but they are good enough that they will be eaten. I think RXBAR is onto a great concept, but peanut butter date falls short for us.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Newman

customer_reviews.title: Too slimy, fix the texture.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these. The problem is they are kind of slimy so my kids don't like them tactile-wise. I haven't gotten them to try them because they say they feel gross. I don't love 10g of sugar either but I can overcome that if they would eat them. Again, I'm always looking for good healthu snacks for my kids so hoped these would get in the mix. I'm going to figure out if I can bake them for a couple of minutes to dry the outsides.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Zolar

customer_reviews.title: Good healthy snack for kids
customer_reviews.text: So-so snack for an adult. Small bar, taste is ok but not something I would find myself craving (kind of dry). What I do like about them is they are all natural and are loaded with protein. So, I would probably love giving them to my grandchildren. Just for my mid-day cravings, these really don't fit the bill. I prefer my other protein bars better. Probably will not be purchasing any more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it at all - yuck
customer_reviews.text: A mixed review here. The 11 year old likes it, but mom and I both hate it. Somehow the taste of PB just doesn't work with this chewiness. I've had PB/chocolate Kind bars (like those), and PB Nature Valley (like those), but yuck I really did not like these. It's obviously a very subjective opinion even among members of our household that like PB (me included), but I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Blake

customer_reviews.title: Not good?
customer_reviews.text: My son says these are nasty (he is 2), I do not like peanut butter and jelly So I’m sure I would agree with him, my husband on the other hand says That these taste great and he has been taking them with his lunches. He Pretty much likes every snack/protein bar he’s ever eaten though so our Family might be two sides of the extreme.
customer_reviews.author: ColeTan

customer_reviews.title: mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: the biggest issue of this bar was taste, Two spit it out and threw out their bar, one liked it, and I was just meh about it. I wouldn't buy it. On the plus side it doesn't have artificial sweeteners and does have healthy ingredients. It's also kosher, not always easy to find in a kid's snack.
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely kid sized bars. But not bad for an adult who prefers smaller portions. The texture is moist and chewy. This definitely tastes like a peanut butter and jelly. Only a few whole food ingredients. Non GMO. Nutritional snack that kids and adults will love. 7 grams of protein per bar. i will definitely be trying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: 💚TosaTat💚

customer_reviews.title: These are a great snack for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: These are a great snack for the kiddos. I like that they don't have very many ingredients and are a whole food. The flavor is pleasant for the kids to eat. They do have a bit of a sticky texture that my youngest didn't love (they require a bit of chewing and she doesn't have her back molars yet). But these would be a great snack for an older kiddo!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old grandson likes the flavor but doesn’t care for the texture. He says it is “chewy and thick.” I say, “What’s the matter with that?” The bars are made of natural, healthy ingredients that make these bars a good alternative for the kiddos rather than the usual unhealthy snacks.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: Good taste. Great ingredients. Great protein source for your little ones. Highly recommend these, if your school, camp, etc. does not have nut restrictions. Adults can have these, too. YUMMY
customer_reviews.author: Bunson Honeydew

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste like peanut butter and jelly
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like chopped up peanuts and dates. Ingredients seem pretty health. Makes a nice snake. Plenty of good ingredients. Moderate sweetness. Tasty, but not doing cartwheels. 3.5 stars rounded up to 4.
customer_reviews.author: B.Willis

customer_reviews.title: Taste great and convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are very good. The only surprise is that there is a lot more peanut flavor than jelly flavor. Still, they taste a lot better than most protein bars that I've tried and I like the small bar size.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Like a fruit roll up with protein.
customer_reviews.text: We really liked these. If your a fan of fruit roll ups, this protein bar tastes similar. Very mild and doesn’t stick to your teeth as much as a fruit roll up. Better for you and packable. Will get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: These bars taste JUST like that!
customer_reviews.text: You know when you used to leave your PB&J in your bookbag all day and it would sort of melt together and create some new kind of sandwich? These bars taste JUST like that!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Henri

customer_reviews.title: Lower price? Twice as nice
customer_reviews.text: So, I accidentally came into these after buying a CASE of 96 from an Amazon liquidator for $20. I adore the flavor and the ingredients and freshness are on point. Would I buy 16 of these for $19? No. But they are delicious and don’t upset my stomach or A1C.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't care for the taste and the texture of these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

product_meta.title: RXBAR Kids Real Food Protein Bar, Peanut Butter & Jelly, Gluten Free, 1.16oz Bars, 16 Count
product_meta.description: Just like your kids’ favorite sandwich, PB&J combines creamy peanut butter with real bits of strawberry for a tasty snack. Kids love the delicious taste and you’ll feel great knowing there’s no bad stuff inside.
feature_bullets: RXBAR Kids is a clean label snack bar made with high-quality, real ingredients designed specifically for kids.
Our PB&J bar is a wholesome take on your child’s classic favorite PH&J. Creamy, rich peanut butter is blended with real bits of strawberry for a sweet and satisfying treat.
No added sugar*, no gluten, no dairy, no soy, no artificial flavors, no preservatives, no fillers, non GMO, kosher, no bad stuff *Not a low-calorie food.
7g of protein, 3g of fiber, 130 calories, 0g added sugars*
No surprises here. One look at our wrapper and you can see what we’re all about.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
